SNIPER/ZERGLING

"We will retreat as soon as we have the pod. So give it!!!"
SNIPER fires at ZARDUS again not realizing a rocker is flying at him. 
The rocket passes his right shoulder. The blast of the rocket makes 
SNIPER fly forward into ZERGLING.


ZERGLING is hit by SNIPER and falls back. SNIPER drops on top of him. 
ZERGLING goes into statius lock.

SNIPER gets up just about to faint. he stands up and fires at ZARDUS 
with a uneasy aim.
